en.title: Blood Pressure Calculator
en.seoTitle: Blood Pressure Calculator - Is My Blood Pressure Normal?
en.metaDescription: Free blood pressure calculator to check your BP reading and understand your health risk category. Get instant guidance on normal, elevated, and hypertension stages.
longTailKeywords: is my blood pressure normal calculator
en.description: Check your blood pressure reading instantly and understand your health category. Enter your systolic and diastolic numbers to see if you're in the normal, elevated, or hypertension range.
en.summary: Determine your blood pressure category and health risk level.
instructions: Enter your systolic (top) blood pressure number
Enter your diastolic (bottom) blood pressure number
View your BP category and health risk assessment
See recommendations for your BP range

seoContent.introduction: Our blood pressure calculator helps you understand your BP readings and assess your cardiovascular health risk. Enter your systolic and diastolic numbers to instantly determine your blood pressure category and get personalized guidance on maintaining healthy blood pressure.
benefits: Instantly categorize your blood pressure reading
Understand your health risk level
Track blood pressure trends over time
Get recommendations based on your BP category
Identify hypertension risk early
Learn healthy BP ranges
steps: Enter your values in the input fields provided
Review the automatic calculations and results
Adjust inputs to explore different scenarios
Use the results for your planning and decision-making
Save or share your calculations as needed
Consult professionals for personalized advice
inputsExplained: Systolic (top number): Pressure when heart beats
Both numbers important for overall assessment
seoContent.formulaExplanation: Blood pressure is categorized based on ACC/AHA guidelines. Normal is less than 120/80 mmHg. Elevated is 120-129 systolic and less than 80 diastolic. Stage 1 hypertension is 130-139 systolic or 80-89 diastolic. Stage 2 hypertension is 140+ systolic or 90+ diastolic. Hypertensive crisis requires immediate medical attention.
examples: Normal BP: 118/76 mmHg - Maintain current lifestyle
Elevated BP: 125/78 mmHg - Increase exercise and reduce sodium
Stage 1 Hypertension: 135/87 mmHg - Consult healthcare provider
Stage 2 Hypertension: 145/92 mmHg - Seek medical evaluation
resultsExplanation: BP Category: Your blood pressure classification
Risk Level: Overall cardiovascular risk assessment
Systolic Reading: Top number (heart beating pressure)
Recommendations: Lifestyle modifications and next steps
seoContent.whoItsFor: This blood pressure calculator is essential for anyone monitoring their cardiovascular health, individuals with hypertension concerns, patients managing existing high blood pressure, healthcare providers assisting patients, and anyone wanting to understand their vital signs and health risk.
seoContent.disclaimer: This blood pressure calculator is for informational purposes only and should not replace professional medical evaluation. Blood pressure varies throughout the day. A single reading doesn't confirm hypertension. Multiple readings over time are needed for accurate diagnosis. Always consult with a healthcare provider for personalized blood pressure management, diagnosis, and treatment. If you experience chest pain, shortness of breath, or other emergency symptoms, seek immediate medical attention.
relatedTools: Heart rate calculator for pulse tracking

faqs.question: How accurate is this calculator?
faqs.answer: This calculator uses industry-standard formulas to provide accurate results based on your inputs. Results are estimates and may vary.

faqs.question: What information do I need?
faqs.answer: You'll need the specific input values required by the calculator. All required fields are clearly labeled.

faqs.question: Can I save my results?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can save results by taking a screenshot or noting the values for future reference.

faqs.question: Is my data secure?
faqs.answer: Yes, all calculations are performed locally in your browser. We don't store your data.

faqs.question: How often should I use this?
faqs.answer: Use the calculator whenever you need to make calculations or when your situation changes.

es.title: Calculadora de Presión Arterial
es.seoTitle: Calculadora de Presión Arterial - ¿Es Normal Mi Presión Arterial?
es.metaDescription: Calculadora gratuita de presión arterial para verificar tu lectura de PA y entender tu categoría de riesgo de salud. Obtén orientación instantánea sobre presión normal, elevada e hipertensión.
es.description: Verifica tu lectura de presión arterial instantáneamente y entiende tu categoría de salud. Ingresa tus números sistólico y diastólico para ver si estás en rango normal, elevado o de hipertensión.
es.summary: Determina tu categoría de presión arterial y nivel de riesgo de salud.

fr.title: Calculatrice de Tension Artérielle
fr.seoTitle: Calculatrice de Tension Artérielle - Ma Tension Artérielle Est-Elle Normale?
fr.metaDescription: Calculatrice gratuite de tension artérielle pour vérifier votre lecture de TA et comprendre votre catégorie de risque de santé. Obtenez des conseils instantanés sur la tension normale, élevée et l'hypertension.
fr.description: Vérifiez votre lecture de tension artérielle instantanément et comprenez votre catégorie de santé. Entrez vos chiffres systolique et diastolique pour voir si vous êtes dans la plage normale, élevée ou d'hypertension.
fr.summary: Déterminez votre catégorie de tension artérielle et votre niveau de risque sanitaire.
